price: (16) Or has He taken, out of what He has created, daughters and chosen you for [having] sons?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَاتٖ وَأَصۡفَىٰكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadha mimmā yakhluqu banātin wa-aṣfākum bil-banīna
